Home » 40P15 Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)
68 Niyataduka, Kusalattika
Niyataduka, Kusalattika
77.
207Niyataṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naniyato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Aniyataṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naniyato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā dve…pe…  avigate dve.
208Niyataṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naniyato naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Aniyataṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naniyato naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā dve…pe…  avigate dve. (Abyākatamūle dve paccayavasena.)
